mapper.select: select q_no, user_no, user_nickname, q_title, q_content, q_regdate, q_recommand, q_viewcnt from question where q_no > 0 and q_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by q_no desc, q_regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(q_no) from question where q_no > 0 and q_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
select * from userinfo where user_nickname like CONCAT('%',#{words},'%')
